summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.9°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm) and cloud levels (up 626 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1576 m), and light levels (up 4270 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1098.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and very little to no wind will be present. Possible light showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and a mix of sun and clouds. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
